wallet_index.title: Hive wallet login
wallet_index.content: Welcome to Hive's official Hive blockchain wallet. Use it to transfer Hive tokens, Power up, vote for Hive Witnesses and change your Hive profile details.

profil.hive_description: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime. Hive can be converted to HIVE POWER in a process called powering up.
profil.hp_description: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards. Part of {{username}}'s HIVE POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on Hive. Your delegation amount can fluctuate. HIVE POWER increases at an APR of approximately 3.07%, subject to blockchain variance. {{link}}.
profil.hive_dolar_description: Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
profil.savings_description: Balances subject to 3 day withdraw waiting period. HBD interest rate: 20.00% APR (as voted by the {{link}})
profil.estimated_account_value_description: The estimated value is based on an average value of Hive in US dollars.
profil.account_history_description: Beware of spam and phishing links in transfer memos. Do not open links from users you do not trust. Do not provide your private keys to any third party websites. Transactions will not show until they are confirmed on the blockchain, which may take a few minutes.

witnesses_page.title: Witness Voting
witnesses_page.you_can_vote_for_maximum_of_witnesses: You can vote for a maximum of 30 witnesses
witnesses_page.witness_list_notes: Notes: in the list below, the first 100 witnesses are unfiltered, this includes active and inactive witnesses. Past the rank of 100, witnesses will be filtered out of the list if they have not produced any block for the last 30 days.
witnesses_page.vote_description: If you would like to vote for a witness outside of the top 200, enter the account name below to cast a vote.
witnesses_page.proxy_description: You can also choose a proxy that will vote for witnesses for you. This will reset your current witness selection.
witnesses_page.use_this_for_linking_title: Use this for linking to this page and highlight the selected witness
witnesses_page.has_not_produced_blocks: ⚠️Has not produced any blocks for over a week.

proxy_form.title: Confirm Account Witness Proxy
proxy_form.description: You are about to remove your proxy.
